column5: Happy B-Day Bernie! Hope you've had a great one so far!
Damn...missed this post.  anyway...happy 'belated' Bernie!
Same here bud.....Sorry we missed it....Anyhooow,HAPPY(belated)B-DAY....And many,many more to ya....(not belated)...lol...TC and tight lines.....Chuck and Shelley....
Hope ya had a great one Bernie! HH
Hope you have a great one, sir!!
Happy B-Day Bernie and all the best to ya !!
Have great day Bernie. Are you planning on spending the day icing some walleye?
HAPPY BIRTHDAY !  take the day off and go fishing!
Have a good one Bernie and many more!
Thank you ! So nice of you guys to notice. Heading to the lake this afternoon!
Happy to ya old man. Joe
Many happy one's Bernie, have a great day.
Have a great Day Bernie!!
happy bday I hope you catch a big one on your bday!  Cheers!
Have a great day Bernie!  Hope you catch a few!
have a great day
Happy Birthday Bernie, hope you have a great one  Joey
Happy B-day.  Jeff
Happy B day Bernie hope you caught a few fish for the Birthday fish fry.   Art
Hope you had / have an awesome day Bernie To many more!!!
Thank you again everyone  Very kind of you all. Didn't get out of the shop in time to get fishing. Maybe tomorrow
Booooooo, that's just wrong.
Happy Birthday Bern!!!  .. yer sooooo much older than me now!!!
This thread should be locked.Quit embarrassing the old guy.He is so old ,when you take his picture it turns out black and white.
HaHaHaHaHa....Too funny.
... not really... but you should consider upgrading/dating your camera old man, what were those shots taken with... an old Brownie???
Yer lucky I have the negatives.
Happy Birthday Bernie, you old Giesler. Don't forget to to remind eveyone that a vintage Giesler is a collectors' item.
